settings.name: Smartphone Connect
settings.description: Access to smartphone connection settings

settings.name: Smartphone Connection
settings.description: Sets whether to connect the camera to a smartphone

settings.name: Connection
settings.description: Establishes a connection with a smartphone

settings.name: Always Connected
settings.description: Sets whether to always connect the camera and a smartphone that have been connected before

settings.name: Transfer/Remote
settings.description: Access to file transfer and remote control settings

settings.name: Location Info Link Set.
settings.description: Settings for linking location information from a smartphone

settings.name: Bluetooth Function
settings.description: Sets whether to activate the Bluetooth function

settings.name: Bluetooth Rmt Ctrl
settings.description: Sets whether to use a Bluetooth remote commander

settings.name: WPS Push
settings.description: Lets you register an access point easily by pushing the WPS button

settings.name: Access Point Set.
settings.description: Lets you register your access point manually

settings.name: Wi-Fi Frequency Band
settings.description: Sets the frequency band for Wi-Fi communications

settings.name: Display Wi-Fi Info.
settings.description: Displays the camera's Wi-Fi information

settings.name: SSID/PW Reset
settings.description: Resets the SSID and password for smartphone connections

settings.name: Bluetooth Info.
settings.description: Displays the camera's Bluetooth information

settings.name: Network Reset
settings.description: Resets all network settings to default values

settings.name: FTP Transfer Func.
settings.description: Access to FTP transfer function settings

settings.name: FTP Server
settings.description: Configures FTP server settings

settings.name: Transfer Function
settings.description: Enables or disables FTP transfer functionality

settings.name: Auto FTP Mode
settings.description: Sets whether to automatically transfer images to FTP server after shooting

settings.name: PC Remote Function
settings.description: Access to PC remote function settings

settings.name: PC Remote
settings.description: Sets whether to use the PC Remote function

settings.name: PC Remote Conn. Method
settings.description: Sets the connection method for PC Remote

settings.name: Pairing
settings.description: Pairs the camera with PC Remote application

settings.name: Ctrl w/ Smartphone
settings.description: Access to controlling the camera with a smartphone

settings.name: Airplane Mode
settings.description: Disables all wireless communications from the device

settings.name: Smartphone Connection
settings.description: Sets whether to connect the camera to a smartphone

settings.name: Connection Type
settings.description: Sets the method for connecting to a smartphone

settings.name: Always Connected
settings.description: Sets whether to always connect the camera and a smartphone that have been connected before

settings.name: Connection Info.
settings.description: Displays information for connecting the camera to a smartphone

settings.name: Smartphone Registration
settings.description: Registers a new smartphone for connection

settings.name: Delete Registered Device
settings.description: Removes a registered smartphone
